name: Penguin Nobleman
text:
1 "Penguin" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Penguin" Synchro monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 2 "Penguin" monsters in your GY; Special Summon them but their effects are negated. You cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn after you activate this effect except "Penguin" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-down card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. Whilst this card is in the GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster in your GY except "Penguin Nobleman". You can only use each effect of "Penguin Nobleman" once per turn.
